_language_code.crowdinContext: Language code used by HTML, e.g. 'en'

another client took control.text: une autre cliente a pris le contrôle
another client took control.crowdinContext: Displayed if another web client takes the connection

At start of threading.crowdinContext: Displayed if you try to undo threading past the beginning

At start of weaving.crowdinContext: Displayed if you try to undo weaving past the beginning

Back to front.crowdinContext: Setting to thread from the back of the loom to the front

cannot jump.text: Impossible de sauter jusqu'à la fin
cannot jump.crowdinContext: Part of an error messsage: cannot perform the requested jump

Clear Recents.crowdinContext: Pattern menu item to clear recent entries

Command mock loom.text: Commandez le métier à tisser fictif
Command mock loom.crowdinContext: Heading for the debug controls that are only shown in mock mode

connected.crowdinContext: Shown when the loom server is fully connected to the loom

connecting.crowdinContext: Shown when the loom server is in the process of connecting to the loom

Debug (mock loom).crowdinContext: Heading for debug controls when using the mock loom

Default threading group size.text: Taille du groupe de threads par défaut

Direction control.crowdinContext: Label text for a setting that allows the user to specify how weave/unweave direction is controlled

disconnected.crowdinContext: Shown when the loom server is fully disconnected from the loom

disconnecting.crowdinContext: Shown when the loom server in the process of disconnecting from the loom

Warp threads.crowdinContext: Label for current warp thread numbers (in Threading mode)

Front to back.crowdinContext: Setting to thread from the front of the loom to the back

Group size.crowdinContext: Number of warp ends to raise shafts for when threading

Jump.crowdinContext: Label for the button that applies the requested jump

Left to right.crowdinContext: Setting: thread from left to right

Loom name.crowdinContext: Name of the loom to display in the web interface

Loom.crowdinContext: Direction control: Loom (typically a button on the dobby head)

lost connection to server.crowdinContext: Error message if the connection from the user to the loom server drops

Next.crowdinContext: Button label for debug control that tells the mock loom to request the next pick (or thread group)

Number must be.crowdinContext: Example: user-specified numeric value must be <= 0

no pattern.crowdinContext: Displayed if no weaving pattern has been selected

On the left.crowdinContext: Setting: display warp thread 1 on the left

On the right.crowdinContext: Setting: display warp thread 1 on the right

Weft thread.crowdinContext: Label for the current weft thread number (in Weaving mode)

Read message.crowdinContext: Label for debug display of the most recent message read from the loom

Reset.crowdinContext: Label to clear the Jump input

Right to left.crowdinContext: Setting: thread from right to left

Save.crowdinContext: Button that submits a new loom name

Sent command.crowdinContext: Label for debug display of the most recent command sent to the loom server

Separate repeats?.crowdinContext: Should there be a separator row, with all shafts down, after each pattern repeat?

Settings.crowdinContext: Tab heading for the Settings panel

Shafts.crowdinContext: Label for display of which shafts are raised

Thread.crowdinContext: Threading direction: go forward to thread new heddles. Also a label for menus that control the users's preferences for threading, e.g. front to back or back to front

Threading.crowdinContext: Tab heading for the Threading panel

timed out.crowdinContext: Part of an error message if a command times out

Too many files.crowdinContext: Displayed if a user tries to upload too many files at once

Unthread.crowdinContext: Threading direction: go backwards to undo a mistake

Unweave.crowdinContext: Weaving direction: go backwards to undo a mistake

Upload.crowdinContext: Button label to upload weaving pattern files

Warp thread 1.crowdinContext: Setting: display warp thread 1 on the right or left

Weave.crowdinContext: Weaving direction: go forward to weave new cloth

Weaving.crowdinContext: Tab heading for the weaving panel
